name: Chana Masala Spiced Roasted Nuts
description: A vegan gluten-free snack! Masala Spiced Roasted Nuts are super addictive.
recipeIngredient: 1-1.5 cups nuts of choice (Cashews, pecans, walnuts, almonds, macadamia, pistachios etc)
1/2 teaspoon spice blend of choice like garam masala or chana masala spice blend
black pepper or chili powder to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a large skillet, add a teaspoon of oil and heat over low-medium.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large skillet, add a teaspoon of oil and heat over low-medium.

recipeInstructions.text: When hot, add a cup of nuts(I used cashews, walnuts, pecans, almonds, pistachios), salt, black pepper and chana masala spice blend to taste, and mix to coat well.
recipeInstructions.name: When hot, add a cup of nuts(I used cashews, walnuts, pecans, almonds, pistachios), salt, black pepper and chana masala spice blend to taste, and mix to coat well.

recipeInstructions.text: Roast on stove stirring every few seconds for 8-10 minutes until cashews start to look golden.(Reduce heat to low after 6 or so minutes to reduce chances of burning)
recipeInstructions.name: Roast on stove stirring every few seconds for 8-10 minutes until cashews start to look golden.(Reduce heat to low after 6 or so minutes to reduce chances of burning)

recipeInstructions.text: Take off heat. The nuts will continue to roast for the next 2-3 minutes once off heat too. The Omega fats in the nuts can burn and damage easily, so roast them to just a light golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Take off heat. The nuts will continue to roast for the next 2-3 minutes once off heat too. The Omega fats in the nuts can burn and damage easily, so roast them to just a light golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool completely, adjust salt and spice. Snack!
recipeInstructions.name: Cool completely, adjust salt and spice. Snack!

recipeInstructions.text: You can also bake these for about 12-15 minutes at preheated 330 degrees F. Stir once after 10 minutes and check on them. Oven temperatures vary, so keep the temperature on the lower side.
recipeInstructions.name: You can also bake these for about 12-15 minutes at preheated 330 degrees F. Stir once after 10 minutes and check on them. Oven temperatures vary, so keep the temperature on the lower side.

recipeInstructions.text: You can roast the nuts on stove or bake with no oil too, the spices and herbs might not stick as well.
recipeInstructions.name: You can roast the nuts on stove or bake with no oil too, the spices and herbs might not stick as well.

keywords: roasted nuts, spicy snack, vegan snack
